001package net.tvburger.jdl.mlp;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.LogicalDataSets;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetworks;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.activations.Activations;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.initializers.NeuralNetworkInitializer;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.initializers.XavierInitializer;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.optimizers.AdamOptimizer;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.optimizers.StochasticGradientDescent;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Trainer;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.Losses;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.ChainedRegime;
015import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
016
017import java.util.Arrays;
018
019public class MLPMain {
020
021    public static void main(String[] args) {
022        DataSet dataSet = LogicalDataSets.or().load();
023        DataSet trainingSet = dataSet.subset(1, 3);
024        DataSet testSet = dataSet;
025
026        MultiLayerPerceptron mlp = MultiLayerPerceptron.create(Activations.sigmoid(), Activations.sigmoid(), 2, 1, 1, 1);
027
028        NeuralNetworkInitializer initializer = new XavierInitializer();
029        ObjectiveFunction objective = Losses.mSE();
030        StochasticGradientDescent<MultiLayerPerceptron> gradientDescent = new StochasticGradientDescent<>();
031        AdamOptimizer<MultiLayerPerceptron> adamOptimizer = new AdamOptimizer<>();
032        gradientDescent.setLearningRate(0.01f);
033        ChainedRegime regime = Regimes.chainTop().epochs(10_000).stopIfNoImprovements(true).dumpNodes().batch().bottomChain();
034        Trainer<MultiLayerPerceptron> mlpTrainer = Trainer.of(initializer, objective, adamOptimizer, regime);
035        mlpTrainer.train(mlp, trainingSet);
036
037        NeuralNetworks.dump(mlp);
038
039        for (DataSet.Sample sample : testSet) {
040            float[] estimate = mlp.estimate(sample.features());
041            System.out.println("real = " + Arrays.toString(sample.targetOutputs()) + " vs estimated = " + Arrays.toString(estimate) + " | features " + Arrays.toString(sample.features()));
042        }
043    }
044}
